```{r load packages & data}

library(tidyverse)

enrollment <- read_csv("grad_enrollment_copy.csv")
```


```{r male vs. female grad enrollment (1967-2015)}

#TO DO:
# VISUALLY plot trends: total male (solid line) vs. female (dashed line) grad enrollment (y axis) through time (x axis)
# STATISTICALLY

##############################
# subset total males and females
##############################

total_males <- enrollment %>% 
  select(year, total_males)

total_females <- enrollment %>% 
  select(year, total_females)

##############################
# plot trends through time
##############################

total_enroll_plot <- ggplot(total_males, aes(x = year, y = total_males)) +
  geom_point(color = "gray30") +
  geom_line(color = "gray30") +
  geom_line(data = total_females, color = "gray30", linetype = "dashed") 
  
  
  geom_line(data = total_females, color = "gray30", linetype = "dashed") 


  theme_classic() +
  theme(panel.border = element_rect(colour = "black", fill = NA, size = 0.7)) +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Total Male & Female Graduate Student Enrollment in the U.S.")

abund_traps_plot <- ggplot(abund_by_yearssite, aes(x = YEAR, y = count)) +
  geom_point(color = "gray30") +
  geom_line(color = "gray30") +
  geom_point(data = traps_by_yearssite, color = "gray30") +
  geom_line(data = traps_by_yearssite, linetype = "dashed", color = "gray30") +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(axis.text = element_text(color = "black"), 
        panel.border = element_rect(colour = "black", fill=NA, size=0.7), 
        strip.background = element_rect(fill = "grey"),
        plot.caption = element_text(size = 10, hjust = 0)) +
  facet_grid(~site_full) +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "Counts") + # caption = caption1 (to include caption)
  scale_x_continuous(breaks=c(2013, 2015, 2017))
abund_traps_plot
```
